channel.title: Making objects show up for other players besides you? help
channel.description: well i made a barracade set up the actual barracade object, but the problem is is that client.java only works with a single player, you, unlike things like player handler, witch deals with ALL players, making my baracade not show up for anyone else. is there any way i can declare it through maybe another java file that will let other people see the object i just placed?

item.title: Making objects show up for other players besides you? help
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

this is my baracade case

case 4053: //Barricade setAnimation(827); deleteItem(4053, getItemSlot(4053), 1); createNewTileObject(absX, absY, 4421, 0, 10); break;
but like i said, its declared in client.java so it wont show up to other players =X

Read full topic
item.source: Making objects show up for other players besides you? help
